text:
Hello everyone, I have a cta in my email which for some recipents leads to a different url than it should be. For me it is working but i got the feedback from one customer that for him it leads to another page. Do you know what could be the reason and what could be a possible fix for that?
Thanks a lot

The client is using:
• Windows 10
• Outlook Webmail mit Google Chrome 
• VPN
Hey everyone, does HubSpot use MJML under the hood?

we have 19 franchise brands under Neighborly and working on lead nurturing campaigns that are similar across brands. A campaign with 5 emails quickly gets complex to manage as that's 95 emails to manage. In order to simplify we're looking to create modules that can be dynamic based on a brand contact property pulling the data from a HubDB brands table with  default options configured through standard module fields.

Hi everyone
Anyone using swell/yotpo? Trying to use Swell Point Balance in a html email file for campaign sending. Writing the field like this {{contact.SwellPointBalance}} but not showing me correct data when testing on records that have this field populated. Showing me the default value.. Should it be written differently or need to add something else?

I'm trying to access a custom contact property in an email module to use in a conditional. I keep getting a warning that contact objects can only be retrieved on membership or password-protected pages but I thought enabling programmable email beta allowed for this. Anyone have any more info on this issue?
How is the CTA created in the email?
If you go into the contact properties in the settings, is the internal name for the property `SwellPointBalance`?
This sounds doable… do you have the email module code to share?

Tried using the crm_object function but that was throwing the error. If I use
```contact.be_an_outlaw```
it will print out the value but then doesn't work in the if statement

Hi everyone
We are trying to develop the app for our application which is generating images(svg) by text.
And while trying to test our app in HubSpot, getting scopes error.
